discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
B is irrelevant.

It should be A and B
because to be able to create PF you need to be member in organization management first then create public folder mailbox to host the folders,
Recipient Management only required in case that we need it (Mail-enabled)
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/permissions-exo/feature-permissions

Selected Answer: AC
it should be A & C
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/permissions/feature-permissions/sharing-and-collaboration-permissions?view=exchserver-2019

choices.C: Add Allan Deyoung to the Recipient Management role group
choices.A: Add Allan Deyoung to the Organization Management role group
choices.B: Create a new public folder mailbox

questions.question_text:
You need to ensure that Allan Deyoung can create a new public folder for the sales department.
Which two actions should you perform first? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.D: the Microsoft Support and Recovery Assistant for Office 365 client

questions.question_text:
Joni Sherman reports that the Microsoft Outlook client on her Windows 10 device fails to start.
You need to troubleshoot the issue.
From the device, you start the Microsoft Remote Connectivity Analyzer.
What should you run next?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
the Microsoft Support and Recovery Assistant for Office 365 client

comments.content: Answer is correct. Outlook is failing to start, not throwing connectivity errors.

discussion.content: Right answer is B - Outlook Connectivity
